code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('/login',new URLSearchParams({username,password}));if(response.status===200){console.log('logged in');window.location.href='/shop';}else{alert('Login failed');}}catch(error){console.error('Error during login:',error);if(error.response){alert("Login failed: ".concat(error.response.data));}else{alert('Login failed: An unknown error occurred');}}};const handleGoogleSignIn=()=>{window.location.href='/auth/google';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),placeholder:"Username",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Password",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleGoogleSignIn,style:{marginTop:'10px'},children:"Sign in with Google"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:'10px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["New user? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/register",children:"Register here"})]})})]});};export default Login;
